name: Bavaria
startIntroPart1: Great and visionary Prince, the Bavarian Kingdom stands barren of the culture and magnificence that once adorned it. Can you raise great monuments and wonders to the glory of these lands? Can you inspire works of great renown and beauty to strengthen the character of the Bavarian nation?
startIntroPart2: Ludwig The Second, Will You Change Bavaria into The Kingdom of Culture, Can You stand The Test of Time With Your Vision on Better Bavaria?
declaringWar: Your Kingdom is Filled with Filth, Such a Waste of Grand Space!
attacked: How dare You Threaten Me, well, I'll just have to Destroy Your Filth, which is your kingdom!
defeated: No, This Cannot be Happening, My Art's Will You also destroy Them?
introduction: Greetings, I'm King Ludwig The second of Bavaria, You can Consider we are Freind if You Also Share The Love Of Culture Like Myself.
neutralHello: Greetings, are You in Your Prime health?
neutralLetsHearIt: You may begin with Your Art's.
neutralYes: You are Wise handing your Art's to me.
That is very good, I was Amazed By Your Wiseness.
hateHello: What do you want now, Be Quick.
hateLetsHearIt: Speak! i don't Like Being Ignored.
Go on, My Art's are Waiting.
hateNo: Huh, No and is Bad a Offer.
I beg your pardon? Your Art's are Nothing compared to mine
hateYes: That is fine, Maybe Art's for Me next time
That is good enough for Someone like you.
afterPeace: Very well, My Art's Is Better untouched by filthy hand.
tradeRequest: I have a Trade Offer, From The Finest Art in all Bavaria is Coming for you.
uniques: [+50]% Production when constructing [Culture] wonders [in all cities]
